test-set.name: math-atan2
test-set.description: Tests for the math:atan2 function introduced in XPath 3.0

test-case.name: math-atan2-001
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:atan2() with the arguments +0.0e0 and -0.0e0

test-case.name: math-atan2-002
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:atan2() with the arguments -0.0e0 and -0.0e0

test-case.name: math-atan2-003
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:atan2() with the arguments +0.0e0 and -0.0e0

test-case.name: math-atan2-004
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:atan2() with the arguments -0.0e0 and -0.0e0

test-case.name: math-atan2-005
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:atan2() with the arguments -1 and -0.0e0

test-case.name: math-atan2-006
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:atan2() with the arguments +1 and 0.0e0

test-case.name: math-atan2-007
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:atan2() with the arguments -0.0e0 and -1

test-case.name: math-atan2-008
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:atan2() with the arguments +0.0e0 and -1

test-case.name: math-atan2-009
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:atan2() with the arguments -0.0e0 and +1

test-case.name: math-atan2-010
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:atan2() with the arguments +0.0e0 and +1
